sentences.english: For sheer dynamism the Beijing Iron and Steel Company takes some beating.

sentences.english: Although Mama blamed me, I was still happy because we had fun today.

sentences.english: Follow the rules and you won't get chewed out.
sentences.chinese: 遵守規定你就不會挨批。
